title: Create FO-08 app directory structure and copy base files
description:
Create the FO-08 app directory and copy base files from FO-06.

Directories to create:
- `app/fo-08/`
- `app/fo-08/components/`
- `app/fo-08/info/`

Files to copy from FO-06:
- `app/fo-06/page.tsx` → `app/fo-08/page.tsx`
- `app/fo-06/layout.tsx` → `app/fo-08/layout.tsx`
- `app/fo-06/fo-06-layout-client.tsx` → `app/fo-08/fo-08-layout-client.tsx`

Update the copied files:
1. Change all `fo-06` references to `fo-08`
2. Update component imports to use fo-08 paths
3. Update layout client component name

⚠️ Do not close this tick until the verification passes.
acceptance_criteria: test -d app/fo-08/components && test -f app/fo-08/page.tsx && grep -q 'fo-08' app/fo-08/layout.tsx && echo 'PASS' shows PASS
closed_reason: Created fo-08 directory structure with components/ and info/ subdirectories. Copied page.tsx, layout.tsx, and layout client from fo-06, updating all references from fo-06 to fo-08 including component names (Fo06LayoutClient -> Fo08LayoutClient) and nav path (/fo-06 -> /fo-08)
